Shopify Reveal Section

Learn how to create a Reveal section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The "Reveal" section by Sections Pro for Shopify allows you to create an interactive, expandable content area on your store's pages. Customers can click a button to reveal more content, enhancing the browsing experience without overwhelming them with information upfront. The section is extensively customizable, allowing you to adjust typography, colors, spacing, and much more to suit your store's design.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Reveal"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Details: Use the "Reveal" section to display additional product specifications, reviews, or related products that customers can access by clicking "Show More."
  2. FAQ Section: Implement a FAQ section where the initial view shows only the questions, and clicking on each reveals more detailed answers.
  3. Customer Stories: Showcase customer testimonials where the initial view shows snippets, and users can click to read the full stories.
  4. Promotion Details: Use the reveal feature to highlight information about promotions or sales. Customers can click to unveil the full details, keeping the initial page clean and tidy.
  5. Related Blog Content: If you run a blog, use the section to reveal more text or additional related posts to keep users engaged without cluttering the initial view.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Text Settings:

    • Text Font: Choose the font for the text.
    • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text (10px to 50px).
    • Text Line Height: Select the line height for the text.

  • Headline Settings:

    • Headline Font: Choose the font for the headlines.
    • Headline Size: Adjust the size of the headlines (10px to 50px).
    • Headline Line Height: Select the line height for the headlines.

  • Colors:

    • Background Color: Set a background color or gradient for the section.

  • Dimensions:

    • Max Width of Section: Set the maximum width of the section.
    • Height of Section: Specify the height of the section.
    • Mobile Height of Section: Specify the height for mobile devices.
    • Gap Between Columns: Set the gap between the columns.
    • Padding (Top/Bottom/Left/Right): Set the padding around the section.
    • Element Spacing: Adjust the spacing between elements.

  • Button Style:

    • Button Background Color: Choose the background color for the button.
    • Button Text Color: Set the text color for the button.
    • Button Padding (Top/Bottom, Left/Right): Adjust the padding for the button.
    • Button Border Radius: Set the border radius of the button.
    • Reveal Button Text (Show More/Show Less): Customize the text displayed on the reveal button.
